Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency} and @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.MjNoL6QtM0Nptxsw]{Rifle Specialist} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.YIIZnklXaHYDx9Iq]{Shotgun Specialist}

Benefits

When executing a buttstroke attack, the characterâ€™s damage is 1d8+POW modifier lethal damage, and when executing a buttstroke attack the Combat Point cost is 1 less

Normal

Buttstroke attacks have a damage of 1d6+POW modifier damage.
